data.title: Walmart Departments and Categories
data.meta_description: We have compiled a list of Walmart departments, their corresponding accounting departments, and how they are categorized for OTIF metrics.
data.text:
For a more in-depth look at Walmart's item categorization, check out this cheat sheet: Walmart Departments, Categories, and Finelines

Walmart categorizes all of its items by division, department, category, and fineline. We have compiled a list of Walmart departments, their corresponding accounting departments, how they are categorized for On-Time In-Full metrics, and some example categories that go into each one.

For more on Walmart's On-Time In-Full (OTIF) program, check out our free, comprehensive eBook: The Ultimate Guide to OTIF.
